name: UAE Hello Card Dialer for DU
description: UAE Hello Card Dialer for Du application is a tool for making international calls by using Hello Card provided by Du.  How it works:  - Home Screen: card details button on the top right corner along with a drop-down menu. call directly by entering your destination number or you can access it from phone contacts. - Favorites Screen: Users can add and remove favorite numbers from phone Contacts. - Call Log Screen: Users can view call history with time and option to delete or redial. - Card details screen: Enter 15 digit hello card number and card value. - Settings Screen: The user can select the preferred language and sim slot. - Works offline  Disclaimer: - This application does not store your personal data. - This application does not allow others to read or access your personal data. - UAE Hello card dialer for Du will only store your hello card secret code and when the application is uninstalled details will be erased. - Hello card charges are valid only for a certain list of countries. Countries that are not included will be charged as per regular network provider charges. Please check the rates with the hello card customer care (800 122).
